data.name: Antidote
data.effect: A spray-type medicine. It lifts the effect of poison from one Pokémon.

data.name: Awakening
data.effect: "A spray-type medicine. It awakens a Pokémon from the clutches of sleep."

data.name: Burn Heal
data.effect: A spray-type medicine. It heals a single Pokémon that is suffering from a burn.

data.name: Ice Heal
data.effect: A spray-type medicine. It defrosts a Pokémon that has been frozen solid.

data.name: Paralyze Heal
data.effect: A spray-type medicine. It eliminates paralysis from a single Pokémon.
